meta.job_title: Lead Network Security Engineer (Blue Coat Proxy)

skills.skill: Symantec Proxy SG/CAS/Management Center appliances troubleshooting
TCP/IP, HTTP, FTP, cookies, authentication, web filtering, virus scanning, web servers, SSL/encryption, reporting packages
Internet facing DNS management using tools such as InfoBlox Grid Manager
SSL Interception and integrated internal environment

duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide technical leadership in defining processes, technical infrastructure support, and adhere to architectural standards for the Proxy Infrastructure and other systems.
Support projects, enhance security, enable automation, and operate existing systems.
Assist in monitoring, configuration changes, and software updates.
Prepare technical procedures, standards & network schematics of all the solutions.
Coordinate requirements with users and management.
Resolve issues in the environment and participate in cross-functional meetings with other teams.
Assist with compliance requirements and participate in Disaster Recovery exercises on a rotation basis.
Monitor and mitigate risk; escalates appropriately.
